trans-unit.source: Controls run-time behavior of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer"></xref> associated with an operation.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior> enables control of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> options, such as the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior"></xref> class with a specific operation.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref> to export or serialize.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref> to export or serialize.
Gets the collection of mappings between XML schema elements and CLR data types.
A <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1"></xref> of <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping"></xref>s that contains the mappings.
Gets the object that holds SOAP use and format options.
An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute"></xref> that holds SOAP use and format options.
Adds a set of parameters to an operation description.
Adds a set of parameters to an operation description.
The target <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection"></xref> that contains the parameters.
Applies a client's behavior to the operation.
Applies a client's behavior to the operation.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref> that represents the operation.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation"></xref> that represents a client operation.
Applies a dispatch behavior to the operation.
Applies a dispatch behavior to the operation.
The target <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation"></xref> to apply.
Validates the operation.
Validates the operation.
The target <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref> to validate.
Exports the operation data as a WSDL document.
Exports the operation data as a WSDL document.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"></xref> to use for the export.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext"></xref> to export.
Exports the endpoint data as a WSDL document.
Exports the endpoint data as a WSDL document.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"></xref> to use for the export.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext"></xref> to export.
